author: Muhammad Zulhusni
description:
Outdated systems are wearing developers down. A recent survey by headless CMS company Storyblok found that nearly half of senior developers at mid-to-large companies have thought seriously about quitting in the past year. The reason? Tools that don’t work the way they need them to. Legacy code, missing features, and poor integration with modern tools... Read more »

The post Why developers are leaving jobs that can’t support AI appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Why developers are leaving jobs that can’t support AI
